full_summary:
### Digital Solution for Business Continuity Management and Corporate Security Services
#### Solicitation Overview
The Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation (CDIC) is seeking proposals to establish a supply arrangement (RFSA) for the provision of business continuity management and corporate security services. The RFSA aims to establish additional supply arrangements during the annual qualification opportunity, also known as the "2022 Refresh," and subsequent opportunities.

#### Project Description
The CDIC requires services to support business continuity management and corporate security. The services will involve providing management and technical expertise to ensure the corporation's business activities are continued during disruptions, such as natural disasters and system failures. The RFSA will provide for the following service streams:

*   Business Continuity Management Services
*   Corporate Security Services

#### Supplier Requirements
The CDIC is seeking proposals from reliable suppliers who can provide the necessary services to support business continuity management and corporate security. Suppliers will be required to provide services that meet the CDIC's standards and requirements. All suppliers must meet the eligibility requirements outlined in the RFSA.

#### Key Dates and Reporting

*   **Notice Publication Date**: December 12, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: January 26, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 21, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: February 28, 2024

#### Submission Details
If you are interested in responding to this RFSA, you are required to submit a proposal, which must include the required information and documentation, as outlined in the RFSA document.

#### Contact Information
For any questions or concerns regarding this RFSA, please contact:

*   Name: Hollander, Judy Ann
*   Email: [jhollander@cdic.ca](mailto:jhollander@cdic.ca)
*   Phone: 343-576-2218

#### Access to RFSA Documents
The RFSA documents, including the solicitation, evaluation criteria, and all attachments, are available for download from the Canada Buy Service website.

#### Status of the RFSA
The RFSA is an open bidding opportunity, and all qualified suppliers can participate. The CDIC will evaluate proposals based on the criteria outlined in the RFSA document.

### Additional Information
The CDIC has the right to modify or cancel this RFSA at any time without notice. Suppliers are responsible for verifying the accuracy of all information and for ensuring that their proposals are submitted in accordance with the RFSA document.
